timeline.message: 70402: authorization logic via pre-authorize, in EPersonRestPermissionEvaluatorPlugin
70402: Tests for replace /metadata PATCH of own metadata at /eperson/epersons/<id>

timeline.bodyText: This method is missing a context.restoreAuthSystemState(); after creating the EPerson
timeline.author: tdonohue

replies.bodyText: please take the chance to also change the email to something at example.com, it was noted by other (I guess mwood) that it is better to use this domain as it is reserved for this specific purpose
replies.author: abollini

timeline.bodyText: Incorrect comment.  Say something like: "// should be allowed (as an Eperson can update their own metadata), and eperson.firstname should be replaced.
timeline.author: tdonohue

timeline.bodyText: Incorrect comment. Should say something like // not allowed, as a non-Admin cannot modify other users
timeline.author: tdonohue

timeline.bodyText: It's unclear why this is now @Autowired and imported into this class. I don't see any new code that uses it?  Are these changes to EPersonRestRepository necessary?
timeline.author: tdonohue

replies.bodyText:
You are correct @tdonohue, this should not be present in this part of the code (Seems to be a remnant of an older commit that has been overlooked)
I'll get these feedback-points looked at. Thanks for the review
replies.author: jonas-atmire

replies.bodyText: I agree these seem like non-standard formatting changes. It'd be best to just revert all changes to EPersonRestRepository.  Could that be done quickly @jonas-atmire  or @MarieVerdonck ?
